parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.52

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Turrets

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns all magazines of given turret. Use turret path [-1] for driver's turret. Alternatively, use [[magazinesAllTurrets]].
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Informative </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> When main syntax is used, command excludes empty magazines for driver turret [-1] but returns empty magazines for all the other turrets.</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle '''magazinesTurret''' turretPath

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> turretPath: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] of [[String]]s

</value></part><part><name> s2</name>=<value>vehicle '''magazinesTurret''' [turretPath, includeEmpty] <template><title>Since</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>2.01.146669</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>y</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> turretPath: [[Array]] - turret path

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> includeEmpty: [[Boolean]] - (Optional, default [[false]]) - [[true]] = include empty magazines, [[false]] = exclude empty magazines - same behaviour as the primary syntax

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Array]] of [[String]]s
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_mags = [[vehicle]] [[player]] [[magazinesTurret]] [0, 0];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_mags = _tank [[magazinesTurret]] [0];</code>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[magazinesAllTurrets]], [[addMagazineTurret]], [[removeMagazinesTurret]], [[removeMagazineTurret]], [[weaponsTurret]], [[loadMagazine]], [[magazines]], [[magazinesDetail]],  [[magazinesAmmo]], [[magazinesAmmoFull]], [[addWeaponTurret]], [[removeWeaponTurret]], [[turretLocal]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
